item.title: Uruguay President Luis Lacalle Pou Has Surprise Meeting With Biden
item.description: Uruguay President Luis Lacalle Pou Meets with Biden Uruguay President Luis Lacalle Pou met with US President Joe Biden on the sidelines of the Summit of the Americas in Los Angeles on June 8, 2023. The meeting was unexpected, as the two leaders had not met before.

item.title: OpenAI CEO Calls for Collaboration With China to Counter AI Risks
item.description: OpenAI CEO Calls for Collaboration With China to Counter AI Risks OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has called for collaboration between the United States and China on artificial intelligence (AI). Altman believes that AI is a “global problem” that requires a “global solution.
